The tree fell on Highway 1077 near Crosspoint Veterinary Hospital. Firefighters have closed both lanes of the highway until they can clear the tree from the road. ST. TAMMANY PARISH, La. — The St. Tammany Parish Fire Protection District NO. 2 is responding to a tree that fell after strong storms moved over the area Friday. The tree fell on Highway 1077 near Crosspoint Veterinary Hospital. Advertisement Firefighters have closed both lanes of the highway until they can clear the tree from the road.
